com.dhemery.configuring

Class ConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.configuring.ConfigurationBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<Configuration>

    public class ConfigurationBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<Configuration>
    Builds transforming configurations. Each transforming configuration is constructed from three parts:
        A backing store that the configuration uses to store options
        A set of options to merge into the configuration
        A set of operators for the configuration to apply whenever an option is queried

    Each backedBy method supplies a backing store to be used by the constructed configuration. The supplied backing store supersedes any previously supplied backing store. The backing store's contents are not altered until the build method is called.

    Each withOptions method merges options from a given source into a set of overrides. If multiple sources define an option, the overrides retain the value from the last defining source to be merged. When build() is called, these overrides are merged into the backing store.
